prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a spooky appearance and ethereal features.
Design a small, shadowy Pokemon that blends into urban environments and haunts its prey.
Make a Pokemon with a unique, amorphous shape that embodies the essence of trickery and mischief.
Imagine a ghostly creature with piercing eyes and a playful yet eerie demeanor, lurking in the shadows.
Generate an apparition-like Pokemon that appears in dark forests and is known for its mischievous nature.
Show me a spooky Pokemon that has a haunting presence and can manipulate emotions in battle.
Give me a tiny ghost-type Pokemon that thrives in urban settings and has a playful personality.
